name: Darwin's Vault: prologue
description:
game was made for paint jam:
https://itch.io/jam/paint-jam-but-long-this-time-2021

it means that every single sprite was maid in MS paint
------

The government from all over the world has started a deadly game! Can you become its winner? Every major city has now become a Darwin Vault! The one who can eventually get out alive will go to a new level... And so on until the final battle! Your name is [crossed out]. you quickly got used to the new conditions of survival and do everything possible to avoid anyone's eyes. You have a supply of a couple of days to collect food for yourself and make connections (groupings are welcome) to reach the next level! Will you be able to survive in this deadly game or will you die in Peacetime? The choice is yours

--------

Challenges:

- Use only comic sans for any in-game font

- Draw your assets without a drawing tablet

(- no title at all

- almost everything  in game using the default MS Paint color palette)
